custom_fields.title: Duration Custom Fields
custom_fields.description: Helping you calculate the time spent on particular statuses within an issue. Working calendars are also used for this, making calculations even more relevant to your team.

workflows.title: Workflow Post Functions
description: Assign Issue to User in Custom Field
Assign Issue to Specific User Role (incl. Based on Issue Field)
Notify When Field Set in Transition
Update Linked Issue Custom Field/Field Value With Current Issue
Add Subtask User(s) to Parent Issue Watcher List

reports.title: Average Time Between Bar Chart
reports.description: This handy gadget does exactly what it says on the tin, it displays the average amount of time (either weekly or monthly) between transitions. Use this to check the amount of time between In Progress - Resolved status for example.

reports.title: User Performance Gadget
reports.description: Want to see the performance of your team at one glance? Then use this gadget to display valuable metrics such as the resolutions count, original estimation vs resolution time, reopenings, and linked issues per user.

reports.title: Number Custom Field Analyzer
reports.description: This colorful gadget displays the analyzed results of the selected number custom field and groups them by any field within that issue. Our customers love this trusty gadget because it does all of the hard work for you.

reports.title: Resolutions vs Reopenings Gadget
reports.description: This gadget is another customer favorite. You can use it to display the resolution counts versus the reopening counts for each user. A simple but effective gadget that you’ll wish that you’d discovered sooner.
